encyclopedia.content: 电影《center stage》中Friends Forever发行于2000年，另一个名字是“Graduation” 当年美国每一个面临毕业的学生都听过，它几乎成为2000年的“圣歌”。《惊声尖笑2》中女主角开车去贵屋的时候在车上唱的那首歌。一首很好的歌，适合在毕业时做视频等用，歌词写的非常有感觉。

entry.def: Graduation is the successful completion of a course of study at a university, college, or school, for which you receive a degree or diploma.

example.ex: They asked what his plans were after graduation...
example.tran: 他们问他毕业之后有何打算。

example.ex: Upon graduation he joined a small law firm.
example.tran: 他一毕业就进了一家小型律师事务所。

entry.def: A graduation is a special ceremony at university, college, or school, at which degrees and diplomas are given to students who have successfully completed their studies.

example.ex: At my brother's high school graduation the students recited a poem.
example.tran: 在我弟弟的高中毕业典礼上，学生们朗诵了一首诗。

entry.def: A graduation is a line or number on a container or measuring instrument which marks a particular measurement.

means.word_mean: 1. the successful completion of a program of study
2. an academic exercise in which diplomas are conferred
3. a line (as on a vessel or ruler) that marks a measurement;
4. the act of arranging in grades

stems_affixes.word_buile: de向下+grad步,级+ing……的→向下降了→不名誉的

retro向后+grade等级,级别→向后退步

graduate[n.大学毕业生,研究生 v.大学毕业 adj.毕了业的]+ion表名词→n.毕业[典礼];刻度
down向下+grade[n.等级,级别;年级;分数 v.分等,分级]→向下降级
de向下+grade[n.等级,级别;年级;分数 v.分等,分级]→向下降级
retro向后+grade等级,级别→向后退步
up向上+grade[n.等级,级别;年级;分数 v.分等,分级]→向上升级

Sentence.sentence: Teaching skills to be used right after graduation only.

A Hills dale teacher who became principal last year, remembers sitting with other teachers watching students file out of a graduation ceremony and asking one another in astonishment, "How did that student graduate?
Where did the man get his first job after graduation?

sentences.en: His graduation will never take place if he doesn’t get to work.
sentences.cn: 他要是不用功就永远毕不了业。
